cmd='COMMAND;sh;-c;printf "glib_cv_stack_grows=no\nglib_cv_uscore=no\nglib_cv_eventfd=no\nac_cv_func_pipe2=no\nac_cv_func_posix_getpwuid_r=no\nac_cv_func_posix_getgrgid_r=no\n" > arm_cache.conf;COMMAND;sh;-c;CC="arm-linux-gnueabi-gcc -static-libstdc++ -std=gnu89 -std=gnu89" LIBFFI_CFLAGS="-I/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/libffi/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/libffi-prefix/src/libffi-build/include" LIBFFI_LIBS="-L/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/libffi/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/libffi-prefix/src/libffi-build/.libs -lffi" ZLIB_CFLAGS="-I/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/zlib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/zlib-prefix/src/zlib/include" ZLIB_LIBS="-L/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/zlib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/zlib-prefix/src/zlib -lz" /root/koreader/base/thirdparty/glib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/glib-prefix/src/glib/configure --with-libiconv="no" --with-threads=posix --prefix=/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/glib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/glib-prefix/src/glib-build --without-included-gettext --with-gettext=no --enable-shared=glib --disable-libelf --with-pcre=internal --disable-selinux --disable-compile-warnings --disable-static CFLAGS="-O2 -ffast-math -pipe -fomit-frame-pointer  -march=armv7-a -mtune=cortex-a8 -mfpu=neon -mthumb -mfloat-abi=softfp -fno-finite-math-only -fno-stack-protector -U_FORTIFY_SOURCE -fPIC" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-O1 -Wl,--as-needed -static-libstdc++ -Wl,-rpath-link,/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/zlib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/zlib-prefix/src/zlib/lib -Wl,-rpath-link,/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/libffi/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/libffi-prefix/src/libffi-build/.libs -Wl,-rpath-link,/root/koreader/base/thirdparty/glib/build/arm-linux-gnueabi/glib-prefix/src/glib-build/gmodule/.libs" --host=arm-linux-gnueabi --cache-file=arm_cache.conf'
